item.text: Now Peter and John were going up to the temple at the time for prayer, at three o’clock in the afternoon.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="5560" class="">lame</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1537">from</st> <st data-num="2836">birth</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="5225" class="">being</st> <st data-num="941" class="">carried up</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> was <st data-num="5087" class="">placed</st> at the <st data-num="2411">temple</st> <st data-num="2374" class="">gate</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">called</st> “the <st data-num="5611" class="">Beautiful</st> Gate” <st data-num="2596" class="">every</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st><n id="3" /> so he could <st data-num="154">beg for</st> <st data-num="1654" class="">money</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> those <st data-num="1531">going into</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st>.<n id="5" />

When <st data-num="3739">he</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="3195" class="">about</st> to <st data-num="1524">go into</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="2065" class="">asked</st> them for <st data-num="1654" class="">money</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="816">looked directly</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> (as did <st data-num="2491" class="">John)</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="991">Look at</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> the lame man<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1907">paid attention</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="4328" class="">expecting</st> to <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">something</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="694" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5553" class="">gold</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> I do <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> I <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="3480" class="">Nazarene</st>, <st data-num="1453">stand up</st> <st data-num="2532">and</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4043" class="">walk</st>!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> Peter<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4084">took hold</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> by the <st data-num="1188" class="">right</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> and <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">up</st>, <st data-num="1161">and</st> <st data-num="3916">at once</st> the <st data-num="846">man’s</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="939" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4974" class="">ankles</st> were <st data-num="4732">made strong</st>.<n id="5" />

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1814">jumped up</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> began <st data-num="4043" class="">walking around</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="4043" class="">walking</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="242" class="">leaping</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="134" class="">praising</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="3956" class="">All</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walking</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="134" class="">praising</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,
and they recognized him as the man who used to sit and ask for donations at the Beautiful Gate of the temple, and they were filled with astonishment and amazement at what had happened to him.
While the man was hanging on to Peter and John, all the people, completely astounded, ran together to them in the covered walkway called Solomon’s Portico.

When <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> this, he <st data-num="611" class="">declared</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>, “<st data-num="435">Men</st> of <st data-num="2475" class="">Israel</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> are you <st data-num="2296" class="">amazed</st> <st data-num="1909">at</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>? <st data-num="5101" class="">Why</st><n id="2" /> do you <st data-num="816" class="">stare at</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> if we had <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> <st data-num="846">this man</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4043" class="">walk</st> by our <st data-num="2398" class="">own</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2150" class="">piety</st>?

The <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st>, <st data-num="2464" class="">Isaac</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2384" class="">Jacob</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">forefathers</st>,<n id="2" /> has <st data-num="1392" class="">glorified</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3816" class="">servant</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3860">handed over</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="720" class="">rejected</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4383" class="">presence</st> of <st data-num="4091" class="">Pilate</st> after he had <st data-num="2919" class="">decided</st><n id="6" /> to <st data-num="630" class="">release</st> <st data-num="1565">him</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="720" class="">rejected</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1342">Righteous One</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="154" class="">asked</st> that a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> who was a <st data-num="5406" class="">murderer</st> be <st data-num="5483" class="">released</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

You <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="747" class="">Originator</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>. To <st data-num="3739">this fact</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witnesses</st>!<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1909">on the basis</st> of <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> in <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus’</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> very <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> has made <st data-num="3778" class="">this man</st>—<st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> you <st data-num="2334" class="">see</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st>—<st data-num="4732" class="">strong</st>. The<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> that is <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="4" /> has <st data-num="1325">given</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3647">complete health</st> <st data-num="561">in the presence</st><n id="5" /> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st>, <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>, I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> you <st data-num="4238" class="">acted</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> <st data-num="52" class="">ignorance</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5618" class="">as</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="758" class="">rulers</st> did <st data-num="2532">too</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3739">the things</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="4293">foretold<n id="1" /> long ago</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>—that <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="3" /> would <st data-num="3958" class="">suffer</st>—he has <st data-num="4137" class="">fulfilled</st> <st data-num="3779">in this way</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="3340" class="">repent</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1994">turn back</st> <st data-num="1519">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> may be <st data-num="1813">wiped out</st>,

<st data-num="3704">so that</st> <st data-num="2540">times</st> of <st data-num="403">refreshing</st><n id="1" /> may <st data-num="2064">come</st> <st data-num="575">from</st> <st data-num="4383">the presence</st> of the <st data-num="2962">Lord</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> so that he may <st data-num="649" class="">send</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Messiah</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4400" class="">appointed</st><n id="4" /> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>—that is, <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="3739" class="">This one</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1209" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="891" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> things are <st data-num="605" class="">restored</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3739">which</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">declared</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="165">times long ago</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>.
Moses said, ‘The Lord your God will raise up for you a prophet like me from among your brothers. You must obey him in everything he tells you.
Every person who does not obey that prophet will be destroyed and thus removed from the people.’

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>, <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4545" class="">Samuel</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those who <st data-num="2517" class="">followed</st> him, have <st data-num="2980" class="">spoken</st> about <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2605" class="">announced</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>.
You are the sons of the prophets and of the covenant that God made with your ancestors, saying to Abraham, ‘And in your descendants all the nations of the earth will be blessed.’
God raised up his servant and sent him first to you, to bless you by turning each one of you from your iniquities.”
